for_sales.sales_text:
Gretel has a cabin with bunk cushions, a porta-pottie and a spirit stove. She has a battery with a solar panel and nav, lights, depth sounder and log.

The fittings have all been replaced with stainless and she has Anderson winches. The epoxied plate is a replacement, and she has lead ballast, and new plate bolt and winch. Apart from the standard sails she has a storm jib and a spinnaker..She has a 3/4 cover and little used Mercury 3.5 outboard. She has a trolley by Tyrone Snell with winch and tow-hitch for an extra £3500

boat.full_description: Gretel has a cabin with bunk cushions, a porta -pottie and a spirit stove. She has a battery with a solar panel and nav, lights, depth sounder and log. The fittings have all been replaced with stainless and she has Anderson winches. The epoxied plate is a replacement, and she has lead ballast, and new plate bolt and winch. Apart from the standard sails she has a storm jib and a spinnaker. She has a 3/4 cover and Mercury 3.5 outboard.
boat.name: Gretel
boat.short_description: *Gretel* is a cabin version of the popular Memory 19
